title: LoL is freezing randomly in game.
body: I have good internet, my fps is ok. But the game keeps freezing at random intervals since the update.

replies.body: Frame drops can usually happen from outdated drivers or corrupted game files, but the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) can also be a factor.  If you've recently done nay windows updates, that bar auto-enabled for some players and caused fps or freezing issues.  Otherwise, I recommend going over each step of the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to tune things up.  I hope that helps!

Thanks for the clarification!  In this case, the game bar wouldn't do anything for your specific issue.  Instead, make sure to select the Mac instructions in the fps guide for instructions specific to your OS.

I have tried the guide for Mac, but as of the most recent patch, I too have been suffering from constant mini freezes throughout my game. they are about at 4 second intervals. I have set my client to the minimum settings, but even at the start of the match, before leaving the base, it freezes. It happens like 3 out of 10 patches.

I also play on Mac and the same thing is happening to me. I cant type in the chat without having a “mini freeze” and it also occasionally happens throughout the game whilst playing. It doesnt seem like lag. For me also, it only started after the most recent patch. 

Do I have to reinstall to fix this?
Currently also experiencing this problem really frustrating and its not ping related also not fps related from what i can see i hover at 123 im on a mbp
Have the same issue for a few months now, did support ticket and ending up telling me to take the pc in. Only game this happens to is League unfortunately. Just not sure why.
I've been having the same problem for a while and can't get it to stop.

Same on PC Widows-10, my FPS is good about 35, the game freeze randomly.
ALT + TAB to switch to Desktop will resume the game immediately.
Then ALT + TAB to go back In game

But you loose 4-5 seconds of game play (Enough to get you killed)
Having the Same problem since the new Patch also in my MAC
The updates are freezing up my game and I am very upset because I got a 20 minute penalty for that reason
